keyword: calories in a red seedless grape
title: Calories in a Red Seedless Grape
meta_description: Discover calories in a red seedless grape, including carbs, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per grape for easy tracking.
h1: Calories in a Red Seedless Grape
assumptions: Average size red seedless grape (~6 g), fresh, with skin, no added sugars or processing.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grape size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged grapes when available.

quick_answer.text: A single red seedless grape has about 4 kcal and 1 g of carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Jumbo size grape (~10 g vs average)

faqs.q: How many calories in a red seedless grape?
What are the carbs in one red seedless grape?
faqs.a: About 1.1 g carbs, including 0.9 g sugars and 0.1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do red seedless grapes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0 g) and very low protein (0.1 g) per grape.

faqs.q: How does grape size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller grapes have fewer calories (~3 kcal); jumbo ones up to 7 kcal.
Yes, 0 mg sodium per grape, making them heart-friendly.
